name: Change.org Inc
membership: We are an observer member of the Global Network Initiative, a multi-stakeholder coalition of organizations which aims to protect and advance freedom of expression and privacy in the Information and Communications Technology (ICT) sector.
goal: Change.org is the worldâ€™s largest social change platform with over 170 million users in 196 countries. Change.org empowers anyone, anywhere, to create the change they want to see. On Change.org, people everywhere are starting online petitions, mobilizing supporters, working with decision makers to drive solutions to create lasting change, and winning their campaigns. Change.org is a social enterprise, and a certified B-corp. Hundreds of non-profits, organizations, companies, political candidates and elected officials run sponsored campaigns on Change.org to find new supporters and raise awareness about their causes.
